site.description: I am a Senior Software Engineer with 13 years of experience in software development and technology management. Recognized by Google as an Angular & Web Developer Expert, and by Microsoft as Most Valuable Professional.

metadata.meta_description: I am a Senior Full-Stack Developer with more than 10 years of experience in development and technology management. Recognized by Google as a Developer Expert in Angular, and by Microsoft as Most Valuable Professional.
